title: Crime Alert 01.05.21
itunes:title: Crime Alert 01.05.21
description:
Perp busted on drug charges tries to get revenge by doxing the police officer who arrested him. Guy tries to avoid arrest by hiding in the attic but falls through the ceiling in another apartment. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
